name: Jotun
summary:
Jotun is a hand—drawn action—exploration game set in Norse mythology.
In Jotun, you play Thora, a Norse warrior who died an inglorious death and must prove herself to the Gods to enter Valhalla.

Jotun: Valhalla Edition is coming to PS4™, XBOX ONE™ and Wii U™ this summer.Valhalla Edition contains Valhalla Mode, a boss rush mode with even fiercer versions of the already challenging jotun!
